channel.title: Slender
channel.description:
Not sure if its allowed to post links, but a mod/admin can check the link for its safety. I can verify its safety as well if need be.
http://slendergame.com/
basically, you go around collecting 8 pages. the more pages you have, the closer slenderman will get to you. He will catch you easier if your flashlight is off, but your flashlight has limited battery power.
Note: If you scare easy, this game is not for you.
[img]http://stickskills.com/omega/wp-content/uploads/2012/07/slender.jpg[/img]

item.title: Slender
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Played it, already a little creeped out by the legend of Slendermen. My fiance was next to me and witnessed me nearly pissing myself. It was all going fine until I found my second note, I turned around shortly after getting it to see the Slenderman right behind me. I ran as far as I felt necessary, turned around and there was nothing there. “Great, I got away, now to get that 3rd ticket” I thought to myself. I quickly turned back around to the damn Slenderman being right in front of me, and I lost.

Read full topic
